message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,800,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to counteroffer at $1,400,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations for a fair negotiation.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I recognize your budget considerations, the value of this product is substantial. I'm willing to come down slightly, how about $1,650,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am prepared to counteroffer at $1,550,000. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable while still respecting our respective positions.
